org.darkphoenixs.pool.http

类 HttpConnectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.darkphoenixs.pool.http.HttpConnectionFactory
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, PooledObjectFactory<HttpURLConnection>, ConnectionFactory<HttpURLConnection>

    public class HttpConnectionFactory
extends Object
implements ConnectionFactory<HttpURLConnection>

    HttpConnectionFactory

    Http连接工厂

    从以下版本开始:
    1.2.7
    作者:
    Victor
    另请参阅:
    ConnectionFactory, 序列化表格
